participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, Maya loves to explore new music and art. She's open-minded and enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to. I enjoy going to museums. I am wiccan, but haven’t told them. I like to smell my own farts. I spend a good deal of time on social media.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, Jack is passionate about cooking and history. He has a quirky sense of humor and loves animals.
participant_2.background: I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills. I am a civil war reenactment participant. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn more about animals and the environment. My favorite band is Pink Floyd. I love to snuggle with my cats and watch funny videos on YouTube.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, how are you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking. I'm from a big city, what about you?
I'm from a small town. I grew up in a family of farmers, and I'm still a bit clumsy.
That's interesting, I've never met a farmer before. What do you do for a living now?
I'm a civil war reenactment participant, and I also cook. I'm really good at cooking, so I don't mind the clumsiness.
That's cool. I enjoy cooking too, but I'm not very good at it. I'm more into music. I like to listen to Pink Floyd and watch funny videos on YouTube.
I love Pink Floyd! They're one of my favorite bands. I also love animals, so I spend a lot of time on websites that help me learn more about them.
That's cool. I love animals too. I have two cats, and I love to snuggle with them.
I love cats! They're so cute and cuddly.
Yeah, they are. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to museums and watch movies. I also like to read, and I'm a big fan of social media.
That's cool. I like to go to museums and read too. I'm not much of a movie person, but I do enjoy social media.
Nice. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm going to go to the museum with my friends. We're going to see an exhibit about dinosaurs.
That sounds fun. I love dinosaurs. I'm going to go to the library and check out some books.
That sounds like a good idea. I love reading too.
